mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ad_invitation_record a WHERE a.del_flag = '0' AND a.inviter_id = #{userId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ad_invitation_record( inviter_id, invitee_id, code, point, create_date, update_date, del_flag, flag, channel ) VALUES ( #{inviterId}, #{inviteeId}, #{code}, #{point}, #{createDate}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag}, #{flag}, #{channel} )
mapper.update: UPDATE ad_invitation_record SET create_date = now(), update_date = now() WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT a.code FROM ad_coupon_code a,ad_coupon b,ad_user c WHERE a.coupon = b.id AND a.user_id = c.id AND b.product_sn = #{productSN} AND c.id = #{userId} ORDER BY a.update_date DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT a.id as 'userId', a.telephone FROM ad_user a WHERE a.id = ( SELECT a.inviter_id FROM ad_invitation_record a WHERE a.inviter_id = #{userId} OR a.invitee_id = #{userId} AND a.flag = 1 LIMIT 1 ) UNION ALL SELECT c.id as 'userId', c.telephone FROM ( SELECT a.id, a.telephone FROM ad_user a LEFT JOIN ad_invitation_record b ON b.invitee_id = a.id WHERE a.id IN ( SELECT a.invitee_id FROM ad_invitation_record a WHERE a.inviter_id = ( SELECT DISTINCT b.inviter_id FROM ad_invitation_record b WHERE b.inviter_id = #{userId} OR b.invitee_id = #{userId} ) AND a.flag = 1 ) ORDER BY b.create_date ASC ) c

SELECT b.is_active as 'isActive', a.invitee_id AS inviteeId, b.name as 'name', a.id AS id, a.point AS POINT, a.flag as flag, a.create_date as createDate, DATE_FORMAT(b.update_date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS codeUpdateDate, b.telephone AS telephone
FROM ad_invitation_record a INNER JOIN ad_user b ON a.invitee_id = b.id WHERE 1=1
AND a.inviter_id = #{userId}
AND a.flag = '3'
AND (a.flag = '1' or a.flag = '2')
AND a.flag = '1'
order by a.create_date desc

SELECT a.id id, a.inviter_id inviterId, a.invitee_id inviteeId, a.code code, a.point point, a.del_flag delFlag, a.create_date createDate, a.update_date updateDate, a.type type, a.channel channel FROM ad_invitation_record a WHERE a.invitee_id = #{userId}
